name: Survive - Can you survive the night alone?
name_original: Survive - Can you survive the night alone?
description:
Pick your choices carefully.... 

Or in the future....

you might end up....

DEAD.

Hey guys! This is a game i created with scratch! It's a horror game where you have to pick choices and survive, there are multiple ways you can end the game! Also because it's made in scratch, you have to re-open the game every time you die, don't worry though it doesn't take much time.

If you downloaded this, thank you sooooo much and even if you didn't, still thanks for looking at the game!

Enjoy the game!
